item.title: PAR
item.description: Proposed a Power-Aware Routing (PAR) Algorithm to optimize energy consumption in delay-constrained UAV networks. The algorithm incorporates the adjustable power levels of UAVs and leverages pre-planned trajectory information to calculate encounters at different power levels. Using this data, a power-aware encounter tree is constructed to identify the transmission path with minimal energy consumption from the source to the destination, while adhering to delay constraints. (2020â€“2021, published in WASA 2022 [CCF C]).
